name: Pre-sql
value:
truncate table cdp_stg_dwh.stg_fecu_company;
truncate table cdp_stg_dwh.stg_fecu_lob;

name: Post-sql
value:
copy adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_fecu_company FROM 's3://$$S3_Bucket_Name/Fecu/FECU_Brokers_Companies' IAM_ROLE '$$AWS_IAM_ROLE' maxerror 5 delimiter '|' csv QUOTE '"' IGNOREHEADER 1 ;
copy adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_fecu_lob FROM 's3://$$S3_Bucket_Name/Fecu/FECU_Brokers_LOB' IAM_ROLE '$$AWS_IAM_ROLE' maxerror 15 delimiter '|' csv QUOTE '"' IGNOREHEADER 1 ;

name: Pre-sql
value:
truncate table cdp_stg_dwh.stg_fecu_company;
truncate table cdp_stg_dwh.stg_fecu_lob;

name: Post-sql
value:
copy adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_fecu_company FROM 's3://$$S3_Bucket_Name/Fecu/FECU_Brokers_Companies' IAM_ROLE '$$AWS_IAM_ROLE' maxerror 5 delimiter '|' csv QUOTE '"' IGNOREHEADER 1 ;
copy adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_fecu_lob FROM 's3://$$S3_Bucket_Name/Fecu/FECU_Brokers_LOB' IAM_ROLE '$$AWS_IAM_ROLE' maxerror 15 delimiter '|' csv QUOTE '"' IGNOREHEADER 1 ;
